#summary Definizione della sintassi per esprimere riferimenti a propriet√† nelle annotazioni di filtro (RFC 2)

== RFC 2 ==
= Property expression language =

  # _Simple property_: default ("." for embedded object's properties)
  Example with entity Customer:
{{{
firstName
}}}
{{{
address.street
}}}

  # _"To many" association_: "[]" postfixed
  Example with entity Customer:
{{{
invoices[]
}}}
  # _"To one" association_: ":" prefixed
  Example with entity Invoice:
{{{
:customer.lastName
}}}
  Example from Item:
{{{
:product.name
}}}
